Text:
Shemyaza,
As usual, You are my God.
Without you, there would be no SH Rugby in my life.
Thanks cannot express my gratitude.
dyemiller

shemyaza brings the goods

want to support rugby but as long as sanzar or whomever it is that controls the rights, doesn't get it out to the US i will be looking to shemz for quality rugby
also - at shemyaza - who do you support?
thanks.  your my only source for rugby on the internet right now.
as usual, a soul-saver - thank  you

Now is about the time for my "Thanx !" to Shemyaza for his sterling work. Down here in Anderkant Gatkantland, we are fortunate to have Sky, but I still dl to keep a record of the games. Can we expect the same during the Currie Cup season ? Thanks again Big Man !

Great season now winding down, thanks so much for all your good work.
 Go Boks!!
